name: Link (itch) (greenworks)
description:
* made in 100 hours for ExtraCreditsGameJam#4 | theme was: CONNECT *

* If you want to go fast, go alone. And if you want to go far, go together!

* Can the two of you play together? Of course! Can you play this game alone? You could, with both hands, and probably on a slower setting

(If you really wish to have the rush of a synchronized play with your mate, try the "LINKed" speed setting).

* Very simple concept: fill the hole inside your heart, love yourself first, and you're all set up to link with someone else to higher places.
